services.name: Household Goods Consumption Analytics Service
services.description: Provides comprehensive insights into consumer habits on non-durable household items, enabling manufacturers and retailers to make data-driven decisions for product development and inventory strategies.

services.name: Nutrition Guidelines Compliance Checker
services.description: A service that evaluates food and beverage products against recognized dietary recommendations, assisting companies in aligning with health and wellness trends and regulatory standards.

services.name: Personal Care Product Label Management System
services.description: Streamlines the management and compliance of ingredient lists and labeling for manufacturers of personal care products, ensuring adherence to international regulations and standards.

services.name: Tobacco Alternative Product Development Support
services.description: Offers analytical tools for tobacco companies to innovate and test alternative products, catering to evolving consumer preferences and regulatory frameworks.

services.name: Consumer Staples Supply Chain Optimization Service
services.description: Optimizes order fulfillment, inventory tracking, and distribution routes for companies in the sector, enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
